actions.name: CreatePaymentInstrument
actions.description: Grants permission to create a payment instrument

actions.name: DeletePaymentInstrument
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a payment instrument

actions.name: GetPaymentInstrument
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a payment instrument

actions.name: GetPaymentStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get payment status of invoices

actions.name: ListPaymentPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to get payment preferences (preferred payment currency, preferred payment method, etc.)

actions.name: MakePayment
actions.description: Grants permission to make a payment, authenticate a payment, verify a payment method, and generate a funding request document for Advance Pay

actions.name: UpdatePaymentPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to update payment preferences (preferred payment currency, preferred payment method, etc.)
